## What is MDN?

MDN is where developers learn

## How to use it?

Read it, search it, start building

## What does it do?

Nothing yet.

## When does it do it?

Never.

#### Some subfeature

But it doesn't split heading level 4.

## Why are you leaving?

We have so much more to learn.

## Did you grow as a human?

All that matters is the friends we made along the way.
